items.name: Breakfast in Luxembourg
items.desc: The latest in our range of seasonal brews, this Espresso Stout is a collaboration with Bare Brewing from Luxembourg, inspired by their own fantastic Espresso Stout we drank whilst at the Metz Beer Fest in October 2019. Coffee obtained locally from Rising Ground in Wadebridge. This beer is suitable for vegans. Contains barley, wheat and caffeine.

items.name: Mixed Beer Case
items.desc: Get a 6 beer mystery selection of Padstow Brewing Co. beers handpicked by the brewery. Usually a minimum of 4 different beers, and maybe more! These beers are all suitable for vegetarians. Please specify if you want beers all suitable for vegans. They contain barley and wheat, which are sources of gluten. Please note: Mixed cases are sent in our usual, robust, courier safe packaging. The image is for graphic purposes only.

items.name: Padstow IPA
items.desc: Our Padstow IPA has a traditionally strong ABV. Careful hopping means it’s refreshing, satisfying and rather moreish. Goes well with: spicy food (perfect with curry), sweet desserts, or mature cheddar and mild blue cheese. This is our best selling bottled beer and has won CAMRA Gold and Taste of the West Gold. This mini keg contains 5 litres (8.8 pints). Directions for use are printed on the container. This beer is suitable for vegans. It contains barley and wheat, but has had the gluten removed to <20ppm, and so is now labelled as Gluten Free. ** Also available in 5 litre mini-keg **

items.name: Padstow Local
items.desc: Our 4% Best Bitter, Padstow Local, is not to be missed. Inspired by some of our favourite beers from around the country, Local is a deep golden ale, with a rich malty character.

items.name: Padstow May Day
items.desc: Brewed to celebrate May Day – the most important day of the year in Padstow, this beer has now been added to our core range due to its year-round popularity. Made with extra pale malt and 100% citra hops; it has a tropical flavour with a citrus and elderflower aroma. A crisp, smooth and refreshing pint. Goes well with: spicy Spanish and Italian meats, paella, pizza and pasta. May Day has been awarded SIBA Gold and Taste of the West Silver. This mini keg contains 5 litres (8.8 pints). Directions for use are printed on the container. This beer is suitable for vegans. It contains barley and wheat, but has had the gluten removed to <20ppm, and so is now labelled as Gluten Free.

items.name: Padstow Pale Ale
items.desc: A beautifully light golden ale, Padstow Pale Ale is noticeably hopped with a good balanced bitterness and a refreshing aroma provided by US hops added at the steeping stage. Goes well with: meat pies and mild cheddar. Also great with a beef or chicken burger. Our Pale Ale has won Taste of the West Silver and SIBA Bronze. This mini keg contains 5 litres (8.8 pints). Directions for use are printed on the container. This beer is suitable for vegans. It contains barley and wheat,which are sources of gluten.

items.name: Padstow Pilot
items.desc: Padstow Pilot is our SIBA National Gold winning Cornish Porter, now available for the first time in minikeg. This mini keg contains 5 litres (8.8 pints). Directions for use are printed on the container. This beer is suitable for vegans. It contains barley and wheat,which are sources of gluten.

items.name: Padstow Pilsner
items.desc: Our Pilsner is made in the traditional way using the best Extra Pale malt, Saaz hops and lager yeast. The beer is fermented at lower temperatures to preserve flavour. The result is a clean, crisp and refreshing drink. Padstow Pilsner won Best Beer at the Great British Food Awards 2018 and Taste of the West Gold. This mini keg contains 5 litres (8.8 pints). Directions for use are printed on the container. This beer is suitable for vegans. It contains barley and wheat, but has had the gluten removed to <20ppm and so can be considered as gluten free. Please note that this Pilsner is unfiltered for the best possible taste, but may contain a slight haze when poured.

items.name: Padstow Windjammer
items.desc: Padstow Windjammer was originally brewed as a one off seasonal autumn brew with specialised malt to achieve its distinctive copper colour. It has since become our most popular draught ale. A malt-driven traditional English ale with a smooth nutty finish and subtle spiced fruit aroma. Goes well with: roast chicken or pork, fish & chips, mild cheeses. This mini keg holds 5 litres (8.8 pints). Directions for use are printed on the container. This beer is suitable for vegans. It contains barley and wheat, which are sources of gluten.

items.name: Pocket Rocket
items.desc: Now in minikeg, Pocket Rocket is the perfect hop-forward session IPA. Plenty of hoppy character, a solid malt backbone and at 4% ideal for a barbecue, afternoon in the garden or quiet evening drink.

items.name: Shallow End
items.desc: Available for the first time ever in minikeg! Our small beer, Shallow End, is hugely popular in can, and at 2.8% makes the perfect minikeg beer. Despite the low ABV, Shallow End is packed with hoppy character and a wonderful piney, resinous finish. This beer is suitable for vegans. It contains barley, wheat and oats, which are sources of gluten.

items.name: The 12 Beers of Christmas
items.summary: Christmas has 12 days, and you are going to need 12 beers to enjoy them all!
items.desc: There is no better way to celebrate Christmas than with Padstow Brewing Co's 12 Beers of Christmas! A mixture of bottled ale and canned craft beer, hand picked by the brewery team and concealed behind our unique "12 days" cover, so you won't know what fantastic beer each day will bring you! They're shipped in our mail-order boxes with a perforated numbered cover - just a bit of fun! It's designed to be opened over 12 days - but we won't be upset if all of the numbers are opened at once! This makes a perfect gift for the beer lover in your life and for £50, the price include shipping! (not additionally discountable) These beers may contain barley and wheat, which are sources of gluten.

items.name: The Smoke
items.desc: Available for the first time ever in minikeg! Made with seven different malts, including beech-smoked malt and rolled oats, this stout is rich, smooth and malty with a subtle smokey aftertaste. Winner of the SIBA British Dark Beers 2019 National Gold award. This beer is suitable for vegans. It contains barley and wheat, which are sources of gluten.

items.name: of Lobster Tale
items.desc: Lobster Tale is our wheat beer. It contains coriander and orange peel which combine to give a wonderfully zesty finish. This mini keg contains 5 litres (8.8 pints). Directions for use are printed on the container. This beer is suitable for vegans. It contains barley and wheat,which are sources of gluten.
